useCase.name: Deploy App with Updated Dataset Type

preconditions.precondition: The app developer has updated the dataset type.

mainSequence.step: App Developer deploys new app version with updated dataset type.
Deployment System checks for the updated dataset type.
Dataset Management deploys the new version of the dataset type.
Dataset Management updates instances to the new dataset type version.
Dataset Instances confirm successful updating of instances.
Dataset Management confirms the success of app and dataset deployment.
